sentences.en: A factory making armaments had been bombed the night before and a residential area not far away had been pulverized.
sentences.cn: 前天晚上，一家兵工厂被炸，不远处的居民区也被夷为平地。

sentences.en: Fontbonne is a liberal arts college, located in a residential suburb of St. Louis.
sentences.cn: 芳邦大学是一所文科大学，位于圣路易斯市郊的居民区。

sentences.en: New residential districts are all plotted out.
sentences.cn: 新居住区的地块都已划定.

sentences.en: Our approach is always to integrate residential buildings sympathetically into their environment.
sentences.cn: 我们的方法总是将居住建筑物和谐地融入到它们的环境之中.

sentences.en: safer and more liveable residential areas
sentences.cn: 更安全和更适于居住的住宅区

sentences.en: Small residential areas have become a priority with the Ministry of Construction.
sentences.cn: 建设居民小区是建设部要优先解决的问题.

sentences.en: The department is responsible for the provision of residential care services.
sentences.cn: 该部门负责提供家庭护理服务。

sentences.en: The industrial areas were discreetly apart , concealed from residential and recreational portions of the town.
sentences.cn: 工业区被小心地设置在较远的地方, 避开了镇上的居住区和娱乐区.

sentences.en: The mayor inspected the residential section of the city.
sentences.cn: 市长视察了该市的住宅区.

sentences.en: The residential blocks were integrated with the rest of the college.
sentences.cn: 住宿区与学院其他部分结合在了一起.

sentences.en: The residential districts were all plotted out.
sentences.cn: 住宅区都一块一块地标划出来了.

sentences.en: The town is a residential suburb.
sentences.cn: 这个小镇是市郊住宅区.

sentences.en: They urged reduced utility rates for hard - pressed residential users.
sentences.cn: 他们强烈要求对经济困难的居民用户降低电力煤气价格.

sentences.en: With residential and commercial estate steadily declining, this is possible.
sentences.cn: 随着住宅和商业地产稳步下跌, 这是有可能的.

words.tran_cn: 居住的；住院医师；定居的

phrases.tran_cn: 住宅建设，居民住房建设；民用建筑住宅建设

trans.tran_cn: 住宅的，适于作住宅的，与居住有关的，适宜作住宅的
trans.tran_en: a residential part of a town consists of private houses, with no offices or factories
